TEXT: [FLAGISSET_haveCanary]You brought back my baby![PROMPTINPUT]Thank you so much![NEWLINE][PROMPTINPUT]Laura began to sing out of sheer happiness.[WAIT120]You took note of the melody.[SETFLAG_melody2][ELSE]Where is my baby?[PROMPTINPUT]She was taken away and I have no idea where.[ENDIF]
NAME: laura
